name: Stian Soiland
content: Stian Soiland-Reyes Stian Soiland-Reyes tl;dr: Senior Lecturer in FAIR, Open and Reproducible Digital Research. Research interests include Linked Data, RESTful web services, metadata, provenance, annotations, open source and software development best practices. research.manchester.ac.uk/portal/soiland-reyes.html uva.nl/en/profile/s/o/s.soilandreyes/s.soiland-reyes.html scholar.social/@soilandreyes (Mastodon) @soilandreyes.bsky.social (Bluesky) orcid.org/0000-0001-9842-9718 slides.com/soilandreyes github.com/stain linkedin.com/in/stain/ twitter.com/soilandreyes slideshare.net/soilandreyes
